list.abs: 何怎么组词_百度知道 ... 何遽[ how] 何苦[ why bother] 你何苦为这点鸡毛蒜皮的事跟他吵 [呢] ?[ is it worth the trouble].
李阳疯狂英语365句 - 豆丁网 ... Don' t be so modest. 别这么谦虚。 Don' t bother. 不用麻烦了。 Don' t get me wrong. 别误会我。.
模块九模块十单词短语背诵_laogao_新浪博客 ... bother to do 特意，特地; bother doing 麻烦做某事 be engaged to 与…….订婚.
“什么意思?”用英语怎么说？-英语-外语-天涯问答 ... Me,too. 我也要。 No bother. 不麻烦。 ... Meaning 什么意思？.

means.word_mean: 1. the psychological state of being irritated or annoyed
2. something or someone that causes trouble; a source of unhappiness;

sentences.sentence: "washing dishes was a nuisance before we got a dish washer"
"he's not a friend, he's an infliction"
